tool_description: A RESTfull API to convert currency and units
name: universal converter
title: universal converter

api_list.name: convert possibilities
api_list.description: get all possible units that can be converted from a specific unit

api_list.name: unit description
unit converter
get all supported currency code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://universal-converter.p.rapidapi.com/currency/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "universal-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://universal-converter.p.rapidapi.com/currency/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "universal-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
